name: My First Zombie Apocalypse
description: This is a prototype for what I would like to be a larger game with much more content. I would say that I am about 60ish% done with this demo. I know a lot of the artwork needs to be redone and or updated, but before I put to much more time into this game I need to know that I am on a good track and that people will actually want to play it. Please leave a comment if you would like to see more.
